short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser with the thrill of Sonic the Hedgehog in stunning Chrome live wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every new tab brings the iconic blue hedgehog’s speed and energy to your screen, making each browsing session exciting and fast-paced. This extension is optimized for smooth, secure, and fast performance, ensuring you can enjoy the adventure without interruptions.

Features:
🌟 Live wallpapers featuring Sonic and friends in dynamic action
🌐 Fast access to popular website shortcuts
🔍 Search bar to easily search with your preferred search engine
📂 Developer info and quick removal links
Get ready to race through the web with Sonic’s electrifying energy—download now and bring the speed to your browser! ⚡🐾
More extensions link is provided on the new tab page and on clicking on it it’s redirecting to https://haberikra.com/.
